"Excellent" reports Motormaster. It will have been the first time he had
resembled anything of happiness since being on this planet. He transformed
into his truck mode. "Well, why dont you introduce me to you're...." he was
interupted by a huming noise from his Comm link. He transformed back to
robot mode. "I need a second" he said abruptly and backed away from the
group and opened his comm-link.
